title: Top selling Nintendo Wii games worldwide in 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The Sales in million units is appeared to be the highest at Month Wii Sports and lowest at Month Wii Party.
Month Wii Party has 8.87 times less Sales in million units than Month Wii Sports which is the highest.
